document.full_text: digital sky technologies, the russian firm that invested more than $200 million in facebook, is leading a group that is buying a $180 million stake in zygna, a creator of online games.
document.title: russians buy stake in web games
lines_and_colors: digital sky technologies, the russian firm that invested more than $200 million in facebook, is leading a group that is buying a $180 million stake in zygna, a creator of online games.
